text: Tom Felton might as well have been wearing an invisibility cloak, because most of these Muggles had no idea they were sitting next to Draco Malfoy at a recent Harry Potter Film Concert Series... ...... read full story
title: Tom Felton Goes Incognito Among All the Muggles at Harry Potter Concert Screening
